name: selenium_basic_navigation
description: Basic browser navigation and page interaction with Selenium WebDriver

args: from selenium import webdriver; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); print(f'Title: {driver.title}'); print(f'URL: {driver.current_url}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Title: Example Domain
URL: https://example.com/

Page loaded successfully

args: from selenium import webdriver; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://google.com'); driver.back(); driver.forward(); driver.refresh(); print('Navigation complete'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Navigation complete

Browser navigation: back, forward, refresh executed

args: from selenium import webdriver; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.maximize_window(); driver.get('https://example.com'); size = driver.get_window_size(); print(f'Window size: {size}'); driver.quit()
